GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: A PHASE IIB, DOUBLE-BLIND, MULTI-CENTER, PLACEBO CONTROLLED, PARALLEL GROUP TRIAL OF ANALGEZIA HCL FOR THE TREATMENT OF CHRONIC PAIN

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: ADAE - One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADEF
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per subject per visit

Description.TranslatedText: Date of First Exposure to Treatment
Date of Last Exposure to Treatment
Reported Term for the Adverse Event
Study Day of Start of Adverse Event
Study Day of End of Adverse Event
Time to Event Origin Date for Subject

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points
Pain adverse event prior to relief
No relief and no worsening at last assessment

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points

CodeListItem.CodedValue: PAIN ADVERSE EVENT PRIOR TO RELIEF

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain adverse event prior to relief

CodeListItem.CodedValue: NO RELIEF AND NO WORSENING AT LAST ASSESSMENT

Decode.TranslatedText: No relief and no worsening at last assessment

Description.TranslatedText: Last non-missing value of AVAL prior to first dose

MethodDef.Name: Time to first pain relief without worsening derivation

Description.TranslatedText: Derived from ADEF.ADY (where PARAMCD=XPPAIN and ADY>1) or ADAE.ASDY where CQ01NAM=PAIN EVENT. Value is the earliest day when ADEF.CHG<0 (for an event) or (ADEF.CHG>0 or ADAE.ASDY>0) (for subjects censored due to pain worsening) or the last record where ADEF.CHG=0 (for subjects censored due to no improvement or worsening by the time of the last assessment)

MethodDef.Name: Censoring algorithm for Time to First Pain Relief

Description.TranslatedText: if pain relief occurs before worsening, then CNSR=0; else if worsening from pain data, then CNSR=1; else if worsening from AE data, then CNSR=3; else if no relief and no worsening at time of last observation, then CNSR=4

MethodDef.Name: Event descriptions for Time to First Pain Relief

Description.TranslatedText: if CNSR=0, then EVNTDESC=PAIN RELIEF; if CNSR=1, then EVNTDESC=PAIN WORSENING PRIOR TO RELIEF; if CNSR=2, then EVNTDESC=PAIN ADVERSE EVENT PRIOR TO RELIEF; if CNSR=3, then EVNTDESC=NO RELIEF AND NO WORSENING AT LAST ASSESSMENT

MethodDef.Name: Date of first exposure to treatment derivation

Description.TranslatedText: EX.EXSTDTC where EXSEQ=1, converted to a SAS date. See SAP for missing or partial value imputations.

MethodDef.Name: Date of last exposure to treatment derivation

Description.TranslatedText: EX.EXENDTC converted to a SAS date for the last record in EX. See SAP for missing or partial value imputations.
If ADSL.RANDDT ^= missing then Y, else Null
If ADSL.TRTSDT^=missing then Y, else Null
If XP.VISIT='Month 6' and XPSTRESN represents at least a two-point improvement from the baseline record then Y, else N
SUPPDM.QVAL where SUPPDM.QNAM=RANDDTC, converted to a SAS date
Last visit with a non-missing record prior to first dose
XPDTC converted to a SAS date. See SAP for missing or partial value imputations
AESTDTC converted to a SAS date. See SAP for missing or partial value imputations
AEENDTC converted to a SAS date. See SAP for missing or partial value imputations
SRCVAR = ADEF if first event is a negative pain score or if worsening occurs before an improvement. SRCVAR = ADAE if ADAE.CQ01NAM is non-missing on a date prior to a pain improvement or worsening.
if SRCVAR=ADEF then SRCSEQ=ADEF.XPSEQ from the corresponding record; else if SRCVAR=ADAE then SRCSEQ=ADAE.AESEQ from the corresponding record.
If AEREL=NOT RELATED then NOT RELATED; Otherwise RELATED
If age<55 then "<55 years"; else if age>=55 then ">=55 YEARS"

arm:AnalysisResult.AnalysisPurpose: Comparisons of baseline characteristics by treatment group

Description.TranslatedText: Rates and chi-squared tests of categorical demographic variables

arm:ProgrammingCode.arm:Code: PROC FREQ DATA=ADSL; where ittfl='Y'; tables trt01pn * (agegr1 sex race) / cmh; run;

Description.TranslatedText: Chi-squared test of responder rates by treatment group

arm:ProgrammingCode.arm:Code: proc freq data = adef; by crit1 avisitn; where ittfl='Y'; tables trtpn * crit1fl / chisq; run;

Description.TranslatedText: Mean Pain Assessments and Changes from Baseline
ANCOVA analysis of the treatment group effect with a baseline covariate, by visit

arm:ProgrammingCode.arm:Code: proc glm data = adef; by avisitn avisit; class trtpn; model aval = trtpn base; run;

Description.TranslatedText: Time to Pain Relief Analysis by Treatment Group
Time to Pain Relief Kaplan Meier Analysis
Kaplan-Meier estimates and log-rank test for the treatment effect

arm:ProgrammingCode.arm:Code: proc lifetest data = adtte plots=s; where ittfl = 'Y' and paramcd = 'TTPNRELF'; id usubjid; strata trtpn; time aval*cnsr (1 2 3); test trtpn; run;

Description.TranslatedText: Time to Pain Relief Analysis by Treatment Group
Time to Pain Relief Hazard Ratio Derivation
Cox proportional hazards model used to derive the hazard ratio for the treatment group effect

arm:ProgrammingCode.arm:Code: proc phreg data = adtte; model aval*cnsr(1, 2, 3) = trtpn; run;

Description.TranslatedText: Incidence Rates of TEAEs by System Organ Class and Preferred Term
Incidence Rates of TEAEs by System Organ Class and Preferred Term
Incidence rates of TEAEs by System Organ Class and Preferred Term
